issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
On Base UI> Views> Scroll Views> "Scrolling Zoom+Pinch" image changes location during device rotation. It moves from center to left top corner.

This is not a regression. The behavior occurs on 2.1.1 as well.

Steps:
1.Open "Scrolling Zoom+Pinch" in portrait mode.
2.Minimize the image which is located in the center of the screen.
3.Rotate device in to landscape mode.

Expected results:
Image remains in the center of the page.  

Actual results:
Image jumps in to left top conner of the page.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Image changes location during device rotation
fields.environment:
Tested on :
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208192014
Titanium SDK 2.1.2.v20120816171609
Devices:
iPhone 4 version 4.3.5
iPhone 4S version 6 beta 4

comments.body:
Also occurs on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120915120319
Devices:
iPad 3 -iOS6
iPhone 4S -iOS6
Note: on iPhone-4S and iPad3 Image changes location during device rotation.
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
